description.narrative: Improved capacity for evidence-based learning and risk management, which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

sector.narrative: Risk assessment and analysis (including conflict, disaster, climate, epidemics)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved capacity for evidence-based learning and risk management

description.narrative: UNICEF Ethiopia has implemented an Effective Learning Strategy at all levels. Risk management activities were regularly carried out to mitigate risks. | Status:Met | As-of Date:24/08/2020

actual.value: 2020:OMT decided not to pursue previous plan of common alternate site for all UN agencies. It is too complex and expensive to manage one alternate site for over 600 critical staff from all UN agencies in Addis Ababa. Instead, based on UNCT decision, each agenc
2020:Report for 2020 Internal audit of ECO is under finalization process by OIAI.
